Exaggerate: The claim may be exaggerating the significance of the Event 201 preparedness exercise by suggesting it is evidence that the pandemic was planned.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide sufficient evidence to support the assertion that the COVID-19 pandemic was planned.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the Event 201 exercise, which focused on a fictional coronavirus outbreak, is directly linked to the actual COVID-19 pandemic.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the fact that experts have known about the pandemic threat posed by coronaviruses for years, suggesting that the focus on a coronavirus in the Event 201 exercise is not surprising.
